description: The dataset comprises information on Medicare FFS claims that underwent CERT medical review for the 2013 Medicare Fee-for-service Improper Payment Report period of July 1, 2011 through June 30, 2012.  These claims were used to calculate the Fiscal Year (FY) 2013 Medicare FFS improper payment rate.

metadata.attribution: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
metadata.description: The dataset comprises information on Medicare FFS claims that underwent CERT medical review for the 2013 Medicare Fee-for-service Improper Payment Report period of July 1, 2011 through June 30, 2012.  These claims were used to calculate the Fiscal Year (FY) 2013 Medicare FFS improper payment rate.

name: 2013 Medicare fee-for-service (FFS) Comprehensive Error Rate Testing (CERT) improper payment data
